resources.string:
Hi, my name is Wangzhichao. 

I am from Huixian city, Henan province, China. 

I am working in Shanghai now. I am a programmer. After work, I like to read history books, watch history movies. 

Even though I work in Shanghai, which is the richest and biggest city of China, I can't help missing home. In my opinion, I simply make money in Shanghai, which is the only reason that I stay here. If I make enough money, I'll go home as soon as possible. However, I don't know when that day is coming. 

In Shanghai, I lead a simple life: work, eat and sleep. That't all. Maybe I should have a change. Get married, Study a foreign language, or something else? Who knows? After all, having fun is the most important.
